description: Polygon indicating continental shelf of Namibia. Line indicating continental shelf break. Slope maps were established of GEBCO data and hydrosurveys of Surveyor General ; shelf break was digitised where slope < 1° and > 0.5°
keywords: Oceans | Bathymetry/Seafloor Topography | Continental Margins, Namibia, Atlas
name: Namibia: Continental Shelf / Shelf break
